parameter.name: practitionerId
parameter.description: ID of the practitioner whose available times would be retrieved.

parameter.name: businessId
parameter.description: ID of the business whose available times would be retrieved.

parameter.name: fromDate
parameter.description: Start time of enquiry for available times. Should be greater than the current date.

parameter.name: toDate
parameter.description: End time of enquiry for available times. Should be greated than the from date.

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: Index of the page to return when the responses are paginated.

parameter.name: perPage
parameter.description: No. of entries to return in a page when responses are paginated.

parameter.name: sort
parameter.description: Name of the property by which the responses will be sorted.

parameter.name: order
parameter.description: Ascending or descending order in which the responses will be sorted.
